titles.title: 817 Come Just As You Are (easy sweet singable)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ye who are toubled and burdened by sin
Come just as you are
Come to the Savior a new life begin
Oh come just as you are

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Come just as you are
Oh come just as you are
Give up your sin
Let the Savior come in
And come just as you are

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Deep in your heart sin has written its scar
Come just as you are
Tho' from the father you've wandered afar
Oh come just as you are

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sinful and guilty heart broken and lost
Come just as you are
Think what your ransom on Calvary cost
Oh come just as you are

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Naught of your goodness for sin can atone
Come just as you are
Trust in the merit of Jesus alone
And come just as you are

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Come with your heartache your sorrow and pain
Come just as you are
No one has come to the Savior in vain
Oh come just as you are
